R

random - Variable in class controller.PongGameController
 
RegisterController - Class in controller
LoginController handles user interactions during the account creation process
RegisterController(Button, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, TextField, TextField, Button, ArrayList<User>, Text) - Constructor for class controller.RegisterController
The RegisterController constructor initiates all pane objects for the createAcctView page
RegisterMenuMessages - Class in view
The RegisterMenuMessages class contains the dynamic messages displayed in the register menu
RegisterMenuMessages() - Constructor for class view.RegisterMenuMessages
The default RegisterMenuMessages constructor
registerScreen - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
registerView - Variable in class controller.RegisterController
 
resetBall() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The resetBall method resets the ball to the field center and randomly applies a skew to its Y position spawn
The ball's velocity, bounce tracker, and beginning movement parameters are all reset as well
RIGHT_WALL - Variable in class controller.PongGameController
 
runPong(String) - Method in class controller.AppController
The runPong method creates a new PongGameController instance and PongMenuController instance, taking in the user's username to display in-game
In-game menu inputs are listened for (i.e., forfeit, play again, back to menu)
The pong game itself begins
If the user chooses to play pong again, then the runPong method is internally called, passing in the user's username
